name: Bleeding Degrees
description:
Bleeding Degrees by Harry and Louie for the GTMK Game Jam 2020

With your health tied to your ability to see, move and shoot you'll have to take damage or you'll find yourself increasingly out of control. A modern homage to old doom-style shooters.

Controls WASD: Movement  LMB: Shoot

Team  Harry: Art, Programming, Most of it  

Louie: Sound, Art, Web
